race.name: Human (Innistrad) (Gavony)
race.ability: Str 1, Dex 1, Con 1, Int 1, Wis 1, Cha 1

trait.name: Description
trait.text: Source: Plane Shift: Innistrad p. 8

trait.name: Ability Score Increase
trait.text: Your ability scores each increase by 1.

trait.name: Age
trait.text: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

trait.name: Alignment
trait.text: Humans tend toward no particular alignment.

trait.name: Size
trait.text: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice.

trait.name: Description
trait.text: Source: Plane Shift: Innistrad p. 8

trait.name: Forest Folk
trait.text: You have proficiency in the Survival skill.

trait.name: Fleet of Foot
trait.text: Your base walking speed is 40 feet.

trait.name: Sure-footed
trait.text: When you use the Dash action, difficult terrain doesn't cost you extra movement on that turn.

trait.name: Spring Attack
trait.text: When you make a melee attack against a creature, you don't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of your turn, whether you hit or not.

trait.name: Age
trait.text: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

trait.name: Alignment

trait.text: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice.

trait.name: Description
trait.text: Source: Plane Shift: Innistrad p. 8

trait.name: Breadth of Knowledge
trait.text: You gain proficiency in any combination of four skills or with four tools of your choice.

trait.name: Age

trait.name: Description
trait.text: Source: Plane Shift: Innistrad p. 8

trait.name: Daunting
trait.text: You have proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

trait.name: Tough
trait.text: Your hit point maximum increases by 2, and it increases by 2 every time you gain a level.
